name: Army Sniper Shooting: Theft Gu
description:
Army Sniper Shooting: Theft Gun Strike is the shooting game you have to play! The terrorists hijacked the hostages. As an elite sniper, ready to fight with the terrorists, and accept this real simulation mission.
Features:
- Realistic visual effects
- Simple and intuitive control of various sniper rifles
- A variety of different exciting tasks
- True shooting sound effects
- Amazing Sound Effects and HD Graphics.
- Latest secret shooting weapons and survival mission
- Various thrilling real army commandos raining military academy.
